option.name: template
option.value: /** * Getter method for property <tt>$field.name</tt>. * * @return property value of $field.name */ #if($field.modifierStatic) static ## #end $field.type ## #set($name = $StringUtil.capitalizeWithJavaBeanConvention($StringUtil.sanitizeJavaIdentifier($helper.getPropertyName($field, $project)))) #if ($field.boolean && $field.primitive) is## #else get## #end ${name}() { return $field.name; }
